json-to-yaml-converter.cardDescription: Convert JSON format to YAML format. Paste your JSON and get the YAML output.
json-to-yaml-converter.cardInputDescription: Paste the JSON you want to convert. We will validate it and then generate the YAML output.
json-to-yaml-converter.cardOutputDescription: This is the YAML representation of your JSON. You can copy it for further use.
json-to-yaml-converter.outputError: Invalid JSON format. Please check your input.
